algorithm_technique: Two-pass approach using sets to count distinct elements in prefixes and suffixes.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the difference between distinct prefix and suffix counts for each element.
problem_summary_technical: Maintain prefix distinct counts using a set, then suffix distinct counts using another set in reverse, and compute the difference.
key_insights: A single pass to calculate prefix distinct counts and another pass in reverse for suffix distinct counts is efficient.
Using sets is ideal for tracking distinct elements in O(1) average time.
The result array can be updated in place during the second pass.
